response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, but considering its importance to you, I believe it's a perfect match. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $13,500. This amount reflects the balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I trust that you will find this proposal fair and attractive. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 13500}
